eu.davidea.flexibleadapter.helpers

Class ActionModeHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.davidea.flexibleadapter.helpers.ActionModeHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    androidx.appcompat.view.ActionMode.Callback

    public class ActionModeHelper
extends java.lang.Object
implements androidx.appcompat.view.ActionMode.Callback
    Helper Class to coordinate the MULTI selection with FlexibleAdapter.
    Since:
    30/04/2016 Created in main package
    23/08/2017 Option to disable swipe/drag capabilities
    17/12/2017 Moved into UI package

    • Method Detail

      • withDefaultMode

        public final ActionModeHelper withDefaultMode(int defaultMode)
        Changes the default mode to apply when the ActionMode is destroyed and normal selection is again active.

        Default value is SelectableAdapter.Mode.IDLE.

        Parameters:
        defaultMode - the new default mode when ActionMode is off, accepted values: IDLE, SINGLE
        Returns:
        this object, so it can be chained
        Since:
        1.0.0-b1

      • disableDragOnActionMode

        public final ActionModeHelper disableDragOnActionMode(boolean disableDrag)
        Automatically disables LongPress drag and Handle drag capability when ActionMode is activated and enable it again when ActionMode is destroyed.
        Parameters:
        disableDrag - true to disable the drag, false to maintain the drag during ActionMode
        Returns:
        this object, so it can be chained
        Since:
        1.0.0-b1

      • disableSwipeOnActionMode

        public final ActionModeHelper disableSwipeOnActionMode(boolean disableSwipe)
        Automatically disables Swipe capability when ActionMode is activated and enable it again when ActionMode is destroyed.
        Parameters:
        disableSwipe - true to disable the swipe, false to maintain the swipe during ActionMode
        Returns:
        this object, so it can be chained
        Since:
        1.0.0-b1

      • getActionMode

        public androidx.appcompat.view.ActionMode getActionMode()
        Returns:
        the current instance of the ActionMode, null if ActionMode is off.
        Since:
        1.0.0-b1

      • getActivatedPosition

        public int getActivatedPosition()
        Gets the activated position only when mode is SINGLE.
        Returns:
        the activated position when SINGLE. -1 if no item is selected
        Since:
        1.0.0-b1

      • onClick

        public boolean onClick(int position)
        Implements the basic behavior of a CAB and multi select behavior.
        Parameters:
        position - the current item position
        Returns:
        true if selection is changed, false if the click event should ignore the ActionMode and continue
        Since:
        1.0.0-b1

      • onLongClick

        @NonNull
public androidx.appcompat.view.ActionMode onLongClick(androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity activity,
                                                                int position)
        Implements the basic behavior of a CAB and multi select behavior onLongClick.
        Parameters:
        activity - the current Activity
        position - the position of the clicked item
        Returns:
        the initialized ActionMode or null if nothing was done
        Since:
        1.0.0-b1

      • toggleSelection

        public void toggleSelection(int position)
        Toggle the selection state of an item.

        If the item was the last one in the selection and is unselected, the selection is stopped. Note that the selection must already be started (actionMode must not be null).

        Parameters:
        position - position of the item to toggle the selection state
        Since:
        1.0.0-b1

      • updateContextTitle

        public void updateContextTitle(int count)
        Updates the title of the Context Menu.

        Override to customize the title and subtitle.

        Parameters:
        count - the current number of selected items
        Since:
        1.0.0-b1

      • restoreSelection

        public void restoreSelection(androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity activity)
        Helper method to restart the action mode after a restoration of deleted items and after screen rotation. The ActionMode will be activated only if SelectableAdapter.getSelectedItemCount() has selections.

        To be called in the onUndo method after the restoration is done or at the end of onRestoreInstanceState.

        Parameters:
        activity - the current Activity
        Since:
        1.0.0-b1

      • onCreateActionMode

        @CallSuper
public boolean onCreateActionMode(androidx.appcompat.view.ActionMode actionMode,
                                              android.view.Menu menu)

      • onDestroyActionMode

        @CallSuper
public void onDestroyActionMode(androidx.appcompat.view.ActionMode actionMode)
        With FlexibleAdapter v5.0.0 the default mode is SelectableAdapter.Mode.IDLE, if you want single selection enabled change default mode with withDefaultMode(int).
        Specified by:
        onDestroyActionMode in interface androidx.appcompat.view.ActionMode.Callback

      • destroyActionModeIfCan

        public boolean destroyActionModeIfCan()
        Utility method to be called from Activity in many occasions such as: onBackPressed, onRefresh for SwipeRefreshLayout, after deleting all selected items.
        Returns:
        true if ActionMode was active (in case it is also terminated), false otherwise
        Since:
        1.0.0-b1

        private void enableSwipeDragCapabilities()

        private void disableSwipeDragCapabilities()
